headline: A Fresh Look at Home Depot (HD) Valuation After Recent Subtle Share Price Moves
summary: Home Depot (HD) has once again landed on investors’ radar, with the latest move in its share price prompting plenty of questions about where the world’s largest home improvement retailer is headed next. There hasn’t been a headline-grabbing event driving this attention. Sometimes, the market’s shifts are subtle, yet those small moves are what smart investors notice. Whether you’re a long-term holder or watching from the sidelines looking for your entry point, this is the kind of moment that...
